item.description:
FAMILY AFFAIR -SATURDAY FEB 13 2010 at 8 pm

Long Wharf Theatre
222 Sargent Drive
New Haven, CT 06511

Long Wharf Theatre is located directly off Exit 46 of I-95, near the junction of I-95, I-91 and Route 34. Parking is free in a lighted, secure lot.

Based on novel written by: Alex D. Tyson
Directed by: Rodney T. Moore

It’s the 1980’s in the projects and Jackie is struggling to deal with life, once an honor roll student and daddy’s little girl, quickly turns to pregnant little girl with no daddy after her father packs up and leaves the family. Due to Jackie not having a father around and wanting to be an adult before her time, leads to all the men in her life playing a role in her down fall and loss of her children, now to win her life and children back she must rely on the help of family, because after all it’s a “Family Affair”.


BUY ONLINE AND GET OUR GROUP DISCOUNT

USE CREDIT, DEBIT, or GIFT CARD

TICKETS ARE $30

CT THEATRE GROUP DISCOUNT - ADVANCE TICKETS ONLY $20

Pick up your tickets at the will call window

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your tickets at the Will Call window, the CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show * Meeting Location and times will be emailed to CT Theatre Group ticket holders

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: FAMILY AFFAIR -SATURDAY FEB 13 2010 at 8 pm at the Long Wharf Theatre New Haven
